# neon_default_region (Data Source)

Fetch the default Neon region for new projects.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `geo_lat` (String) Approximate geographical latitude.
- `geo_long` (String) Approximate geographical longitude.
- `id` (String) Region ID used in API endpoints (e.g., aws-us-east-1).
- `name` (String) Human-readable region description.
